thread.title: Bal

author: Bal
title: Bal
text: I couldn't get hold of the garage tel number after the mot was done. I rang customer service who said he wasn't allowed to give it to me and to Google it and he put the phone down. I just needed to know when the car was being dropped off. They took it around 10am for the mot and I got it back after 5pm. Not great as I told them I had to get to work for 5pm and they assured me it would be back by then. Service was good. Communication was not professional.
